(may also need to update XLA kernels since i believe some of those implement the stateless ops)
…
On Wed, Sep 19, 2018 at 9:47 AM, Eugene Brevdo ***@***.***> wrote: tensorflow/core/api_def/api_test.cc:201: Failure 2429 Value of: api_defs_map_.find(op.name()) != api_defs_map_.end() 2430 Actual: false 2431 Expected: true 2432 StatelessRandomUniformInt op does not have api_def_*.pbtxt file. Please add api_def_StatelessRandomUniformInt.pbtxt file under tensorflow/core/api_def/base_api/ directory. 2433 you will need to move your .Doc() op docstrings into a pbtxt On Wed, Sep 19, 2018 at 9:39 AM, Geoffrey Irving ***@***.*** > wrote: > stateless_random_uniform now take minval+maxval and handles ints, > and stateless_normal/stateless_truncated_normal take mean+stddev. > Additionally, all of the stateless functions now have proper doc > strings. > > This is step one of moving stateless random numbers out of contrib. > > I've only tested this on my laptop, which means only on CPU, so some test > iteration may be required. > ------------------------------ > You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at: > > #22386 > Commit Summary > > - Expand stateless random generators to match their stateful cousins > > File Changes > > - *M* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/BUILD > <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-0> > (2) > - *M* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/__init__.py > <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-1> > (8) > - *M* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/python/kernel_tests/stateless_r > andom_ops_test.py > <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-2> > (154) > - *A* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/python/stateless_ops.py > <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-3> > (214) > - *M* tensorflow/core/kernels/random_op.cc > <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-4> > (34) > - *M* tensorflow/core/kernels/stateless_random_ops.cc > <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-5> > (119) > - *M* tensorflow/core/ops/stateless_random_ops.cc > <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-6> > (53) > > Patch Links: > > - body_text:
(may also need to update XLA kernels since i believe some of those
implement the stateless ops)
…
On Wed, Sep 19, 2018 at 9:47 AM, Eugene Brevdo ***@***.***> wrote:
 tensorflow/core/api_def/api_test.cc:201: Failure
 2429
 Value of: api_defs_map_.find(op.name()) != api_defs_map_.end()
 2430
 Actual: false
 2431
 Expected: true
 2432
 StatelessRandomUniformInt op does not have api_def_*.pbtxt file. Please
 add api_def_StatelessRandomUniformInt.pbtxt file under
 tensorflow/core/api_def/base_api/ directory.
 2433



 you will need to move your .Doc() op docstrings into a pbtxt

 On Wed, Sep 19, 2018 at 9:39 AM, Geoffrey Irving ***@***.***
 > wrote:

> stateless_random_uniform now take minval+maxval and handles ints,
> and stateless_normal/stateless_truncated_normal take mean+stddev.
> Additionally, all of the stateless functions now have proper doc
> strings.
>
> This is step one of moving stateless random numbers out of contrib.
>
> I've only tested this on my laptop, which means only on CPU, so some test
> iteration may be required.
> ------------------------------
> You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at:
>
>   #22386
> Commit Summary
>
>    - Expand stateless random generators to match their stateful cousins
>
> File Changes
>
>    - *M* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/BUILD
>    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-0>
>    (2)
>    - *M* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/__init__.py
>    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-1>
>    (8)
>    - *M* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/python/kernel_tests/stateless_r
>    andom_ops_test.py
>    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-2>
>    (154)
>    - *A* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/python/stateless_ops.py
>    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-3>
>    (214)
>    - *M* tensorflow/core/kernels/random_op.cc
>    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-4>
>    (34)
>    - *M* tensorflow/core/kernels/stateless_random_ops.cc
>    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-5>
>    (119)
>    - *M* tensorflow/core/ops/stateless_random_ops.cc
>    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-6>
>    (53)
>
> Patch Links:
>
>    - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386.patch
>    - https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386.diff
>
> —

body:
(may also need to update XLA kernels since i believe some of those
implement the stateless ops)

On Wed, Sep 19, 2018 at 9:47 AM, Eugene Brevdo <ebrevdo@google.com> wrote:

> tensorflow/core/api_def/api_test.cc:201: Failure
> 2429
> Value of: api_defs_map_.find(op.name()) != api_defs_map_.end()
> 2430
> Actual: false
> 2431
> Expected: true
> 2432
> StatelessRandomUniformInt op does not have api_def_*.pbtxt file. Please
> add api_def_StatelessRandomUniformInt.pbtxt file under
> tensorflow/core/api_def/base_api/ directory.
> 2433
>
>
>
> you will need to move your .Doc() op docstrings into a pbtxt
>
> On Wed, Sep 19, 2018 at 9:39 AM, Geoffrey Irving <notifications@github.com
> > wrote:
>
>> stateless_random_uniform now take minval+maxval and handles ints,
>> and stateless_normal/stateless_truncated_normal take mean+stddev.
>> Additionally, all of the stateless functions now have proper doc
>> strings.
>>
>> This is step one of moving stateless random numbers out of contrib.
>>
>> I've only tested this on my laptop, which means only on CPU, so some test
>> iteration may be required.
>> ------------------------------
>> You can view, comment on, or merge this pull request online at:
>>
>>   https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386
>> Commit Summary
>>
>>    - Expand stateless random generators to match their stateful cousins
>>
>> File Changes
>>
>>    - *M* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/BUILD
>>    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-0>
>>    (2)
>>    - *M* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/__init__.py
>>    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-1>
>>    (8)
>>    - *M* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/python/kernel_tests/stateless_r
>>    andom_ops_test.py
>>    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-2>
>>    (154)
>>    - *A* tensorflow/contrib/stateless/python/stateless_ops.py
>>    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-3>
>>    (214)
>>    - *M* tensorflow/core/kernels/random_op.cc
>>    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-4>
>>    (34)
>>    - *M* tensorflow/core/kernels/stateless_random_ops.cc
>>    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-5>
>>    (119)
>>    - *M* tensorflow/core/ops/stateless_random_ops.cc
>>    <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/22386/files#diff-6>
>>    (53)
>>
